ingredients: 1 roasted or rotisserie chicken, skin removed and meat shredded or cut into bite-size pieces (3 to 4 cups)
8 ounces reduced-fat shredded Monterey Jack cheese, or a reduced-fat blend of Jack and cheddar cheeses
2/3 cup green onions, chopped, white and part of the green
10 flour tortillas, (use higher-fiber tortillas to increase the fiber)
2 cups tomatillos, coarsely chopped (fresh or canned, drained)
2-4 ounce can green chilies, chopped (mild or hot, depending on your preference)
